violations.title: Illegal Parking
violations.description: Vehicle parked in a prohibited area or in violation of posted signage.
violations.notes: Applies to sidewalks, no-parking zones, and restricted areas.

violations.title: Blocking Traffic
violations.description: Vehicle obstructing the normal flow of traffic.
violations.notes: Tow authorized if vehicle causes congestion or hazard.

violations.title: Blocking Emergency Access
violations.description: Vehicle blocking emergency lanes, fire hydrants, or emergency exits.

violations.title: Parking in a Red Zone
violations.description: Vehicle parked in a clearly marked red zone.
violations.notes: Common near hospitals and government buildings.

violations.title: Parking on Sidewalk
violations.description: Vehicle parked fully or partially on a sidewalk.

violations.title: Parking in Handicapped Spot
violations.description: Unauthorized vehicle parked in a handicapped-designated space.
violations.notes: No placard or plate required for enforcement.

violations.title: Abandoned Vehicle
violations.description: Vehicle left unattended for an extended period without valid reason.
violations.notes: Document time and location before towing.

violations.title: Double Parking
violations.description: Vehicle parked alongside another parked vehicle.

violations.title: Expired Parking Meter
violations.description: Vehicle parked at a metered space beyond the paid time.
violations.notes: Tow only if repeated violations occur.

violations.title: Unauthorized Parking on Private Property
violations.description: Vehicle parked on private property without permission.
